item.title: Adb Device No Permissions
item.description: Question 1$ adb devices 2List of devices attached 300000000 no permissions (user in plugdev group; are your udev rules wrong?); see [http://developer.android.com/tools/device.html] Fixed 1$ sudo adb kill-server 2$ sudo pkill adb 3$ sudo adb start-server 4$ adb devices 5List of devices attached 600000000 unauthorized
